DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effectiveness Acu-TENS ( Transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation apply acupoints ) post- exercise expiratory flow rate exercise performance subject exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Acu-Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) Post-Exercise Expiratory Flow Rate Subjects With Asthma
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis asthma attend regular follow respiratory clinic Allergic gel Suffered neurological cardiovascular musculoskeletal disorder may affect exercise performance Suffered upper respiratory tract infection prior study
